message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient has severe nodulocystic acne with scarring, and it has not improved with over-the-counter treatments. Oral isotretinoin is the most effective treatment for severe acne and can help prevent scarring.

Oral erythromycin is not as effective in treating severe acne, and topical isotretinoin and salicylic acid are not indicated for nodulocystic lesions.

Topical isotretinoin and salicylic acid are also less effective for severe acne.
